Fee Schedule Controller Create Fee Schedule should return 201 if fee schedule created successfully

Fee Schedule Controller Get All Fee Schedules should return 200 if get all fee schedules successfully

Fee Schedule Controller Get Fee Schedule By Id should return 200 if get fee schedule by id successfully
Fee Schedule Controller Update Fee Schedule should return 404 if fee schedule not found
Fee Schedule Controller Update Fee Schedule should return 200 if update fee schedule successfully
Fee Schedule Controller Delete Fee Schedule should return 404 if fee schedule not found
Fee Schedule Controller Delete Fee Schedule should return 200 if delete fee schedule successfully
